RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Custom Wave Synth
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: Fabio Napodano | It-Alien (it-alien@renoise.com)
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description:
A sample generator which allows you to create complex new short, looped samples, using up to 6 oscillators and oscillator modulation.
A note range can be defined in order to create multisampled instruments.
Creates a menu entry 'Generate Custom Wave' in the sample editor's context menu (right click on an empty sample wave form).
